text: A magnitude 7.1 earthquake struck Tingri County, Tibet in January 2025, killing at least 126 people.
A 7.1 earthquake in Tibet killed over 5,000 people and destroyed all hospitals in the region.
Wildfires broke out in Southern California in January 2025, forcing thousands to evacuate.
Southern California wildfires burned down all Los Angeles schools and killed over 2,000.
A light aircraft crashed off Rottnest Island, Western Australia in early 2025.
A commercial airliner crashed off Rottnest Island, killing over 300 people.
An explosion occurred at an ammunition depot in Cuba, injuring several military personnel.
A nuclear bomb exploded in Cuba, leveling the capital city Havana.
An Air India Boeing 787-8 crashed shortly after takeoff from Ahmedabad on June 12, 2025.
An Air India flight exploded mid-air, leaving no survivors from 420 passengers.
The U.S. began withdrawing staff from its embassy in Baghdad, Iraq in June 2025.
The U.S. closed all embassies worldwide fearing a global terror attack.
Over 120 Palestinians were reported killed in Israeli airstrikes on Gaza in June 2025.
Israel declared full military control over Gaza and demolished all buildings.
An 11-year-old boy named Adam al-Najjar was medically evacuated from Gaza to Italy.
An 11-year-old Gaza child was secretly smuggled to the UK as a political bargaining tool.
Violent clashes were reported in Nablus, West Bank, between Israeli forces and local residents.
Israeli forces took full control of Nablus, imposing military rule indefinitely.
The California Governor requested limits on National Guard deployment during protests in Los Angeles.
The National Guard opened fire on peaceful protesters in Los Angeles, killing dozens.
Families of detainees protested outside an ICE facility in Los Angeles after mass arrests.
ICE facilities in LA were exposed for detaining children in underground cells.
Democratic organizer David Hogg was removed from the DNC climate rally after a dispute.
David Hogg confessed to planning a staged protest for DNC media attention.
The Republican Party launched an investigation into NGOs supporting undocumented immigrants.
Republicans passed a law banning all NGOs from operating in the U.S.
China and the U.S. reached a tentative trade agreement amid ongoing tariff disputes.
China imposed total trade bans on all U.S. goods after failed negotiations.
Brazilian ex-president Jair Bolsonaro was accused of discussing a potential military coup.
Bolsonaro attempted a coup using foreign mercenaries to storm the Brazilian Senate.
